text: Day Planner was a program on The Weather Channel airing Mondays to Fridays from 11:00 a.m. to 2:00 p.m. Eastern Time from September 29, 2003 until November 11, 2013. It was hosted by Vivian Brown and Nick Walker. title: Day Planner
